title: Your New Home Awaits! 3 Bedroom Apartment Home Available!
posting_body: ['Take a Video Tour Today', '> Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!', 'If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.', 'Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.', 'New On-Site Renovation In Progress!', 'Updates & Upgrades Coming Soon.', 'At Knolls at West Oaks we welcome you to join our friendly community!', 'Our two and three bedroom apartments provide all the features and amenities to complement your lifestyle at an affordable rent.', 'Residents experience exceptional comfort and convenience, outstanding on-site maintenance, and superior resident services.', 'Being a pet friendly community, there are several dog parks and walking trails nearby!', 'Community Amenities Include:', '- Business Center', '- NEW Electronic Deadbolts & Key-FOB Access', '- NEW Water Heater & HVAC System', '- NEW Updated Kitchen Cabinetry', '- Central Heat & Air-Conditioning', '- Convenient On-Site Laundry Facility', '- NEW Bus Shelter', 'We are a pet friendly community!', 'Dogs & cats welcome!', '*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.', 'Knolls at West Oaks participates in an affordable housing program.', 'Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $37,860 | 2 Occupants: $43,260 | 3', 'Occupants: $48,660 | 4', 'Occupants: $54,060 | 5 Occupants: $58,440 | 6', 'Occupants: $62,760.', 'To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Tuesday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Wednesday:1:00PM-5:00PM', 'Thursday-Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Call today to learn more about our community:', 'show contact info', 'Knolls at West Oaks', '3443 Addicks-Clodine Road', 'Houston, TX, 77082', '<URL>', '*Some Restrictions May Apply.', '4k1Af4zosuW']
